results.content: Really great to get you started with GSAP!
results.content_html: Really great to get you started with GSAP!

results.content: Although, I learnt numerous events and functions from this course, but Enzo is a great tutor and  he makes everything easy to learn and explore more.
results.content_html: Although, I learnt numerous events and functions from this course, but Enzo is a great tutor and he makes everything easy to learn and explore more.

results.content: Finally I know basic about gsap. Instructor is not teaching you how to install by npm gsap, so you have to figure out yourself. I have sent some question and didn't got any answer, so I had to figure out by yourself. In intro was a bit confusing. When I have downloaded and started e.g. wine webbsite, I see the video but the animation didn't show up. I think he was showing you from the map finished webbsite. The accent is frenchy and nice :D But I wish that I will learn more animation, it was a bit short. Ps. YOU NEED TO KNOW SHORT-HAND JS functions, if you can not this will be super tuff for you. The last video was really tuff to go along.
results.content_html: Finally I know basic about gsap. Instructor is not teaching you how to install by npm gsap, so you have to figure out yourself. results.content: Love Greensock, i would never have known about GreenSock if it wasnt for Udemy. I also like the instructor and how he is teaching. a+
